name: sourcemap-transformer
description: Transforms a stream containing stack traces from compiled output to reference the original files and line numbers using source maps

scripts.btest: browserify-test --t [ babelify --presets es2015 ] --testemOptions '{"launch_in_dev": ["Node"], "launchers": {"Node": {"command": "mocha test/ --compilers js:babel-register"}}}' --watch test/*
scripts.test: npm run eslint && npm run build && npm run btest

author: Jonathan Lehman <jonathan.lehman91@gmail.com>
